output:
I'd like to tell you these dreams I had
But I'm never sure you what's inside of me
You always said that you were my friend
Will I trust in you? Will you understand?
I used to be so happier in you
But I can't keep inside these words anymore
Will you become my next big enemy?
I'd like to tell you these visions I had
But I'm never sure you the demons I sleep
I used to pray, afraid for my soul
But someone told me heaven was just a lie
I used to be so happier in you
But I can't keep inside these words anymore
Will you become my next big enemy?
